# documentInputMode

**Instance Property**

The text-input mode for the keyboard.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var documentInputMode: UITextInputMode? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the value of this key to configure the keyboard for the specified region and language.
title: documentInputMode
